name: natural ground
description: The natural surface at the interface between the atmosphere and the terrestrial globe, not elevated with respect to the nearby surrounding area (on a scale of 50 meters)

name: artificial ground
description: An artificial surface at the interface between the atmosphere and the terrestrial globe, not elevated with respect to the nearby surrounding area (on a scale of 50 meters)

name: sea surface
description: The natural surface of the sea at the interface between the atmosphere and the ocean

name: deck
description: A permanent covering over a compartment or the body of a fixed or mobile platform (ship). Also the horizontal structure that forms the roof of the hull, elevated with respect to the surrounding sea surface

name: building roof
description: The top or other part of a building, elevated with respect to the surrounding local ground

name: (inapplicable)
description: None of the codes in the table are applicable in the context of the reference surface
